text: Nsesaeԑ de ‘genetic variation’ foforɔ bi ka ho, ԑnna ne yie yi no firi ‘expressed variation’ no mu.

English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. Akan: Nsesae de ‘genetic variation’ foforɔ bi ka ho, nna ne yie yi no firi ‘expressed variation’ no mu.
